I just wanted to take a second to say thank you for your Building Apps with Angular and Breeze series on Pluralsite. Our own in house development team of a mighty 2, of which I am half, is about to undergo a complete rebuild of an older large pre MVC.net in house application and without your thoughtful and well constructed lessons, Breeze and Angular would still be a mystery to me.

Because of your great work, we are pretty confidant that using Breeze and Angular together is the correct path for us to follow for our ground up application rebuild.
